title: Are Jamie and Adam from Mythbusters friends? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not only are they not friends, they don't even like each other. It's been mentioned discreetly on the show a few times that that is the case. They do have a tremendous amount of respect for each other though.  In episode 174, Duct Tape Plane Adam states that it always surprises him how well the two of them work together when they don't even like each other. In an interview with Entertainment Weekly in 2014, Adam talked about their relationship.  ‘MythBusters’ Star Adam Savage Reveals If He And Jamie Hyneman Are Friends; Do The Discovery Channel Co-Stars Really Hate Each Other?  Hyneman addressed this very question during an interview with Access Hollywood in March. He explained that they find themselves stepping on each other's toes more often than not. “We get on each other’s nerves and everything all the time, but whenever that happens, we say so and we deal with it and move on,” he explained. “There are times that we really dislike dealing with each other, but we make it work.” After Hyneman’s statement, fans shifted their attention to Savage, who recently responded to the rumor without hesitation. “It’s not something I mind talking about because I actually think there’s very useful information there. It is true that we’re not friends. We know as much or more about each other than even close friends do because we’ve been at the center of this show for the last 12 years,” Savage admitted during his interview with Entertainment Weekly. “That, again, is informed by a deep amount of respect.” Savage continued to explain that he and Hyneman face difficulties, opportunities, challenges and conflicts daily. “We disagree about the small details every single day — on almost on every, single detail. But we don’t really disagree about the big stuff,” he revealed.

upvoters.user_id: Rt Rev Pagan Archbishop John Seeley

response.answer_text: From what I have read, and gather from some of Adam Savage’s podcasts; No. They are not friends. They work amicably together, and they are not enemies, and don’t hate each other, but they are very dissimilar people, and they consider each other “coworkers and close acquaintances” but not friends. Of course, if either Mr. Savage or Mr. Hyneman are on Quora, or someone that knows them personally, speaks up, I am most happy to be corrected. This is what I have gathered.

Absolutely not! I once heard Adam say that they only talk to each other while filming the show. Other times they have nothing to do with each other. Now that their version of Mythbusters has ended the two of them have gone their separate ways. Adam is still making television appearances. I saw him as a guest judge on Battlebots. He has also appeared on other programs. I think Jamie went back to creating special effects for television and movies. Jamie was never the social type, so I think he’d be perfectly content being back at M-5 creating things.

I wasn't there so this is only based on interviews and hearsay. Hate is a strong word. I don't think they hate each other. They are not friends and they annoy each other. They do not socialise outside of myth busters. However, both have expressed admiration and respect for the other. Both have stated that myth busters only worked because of the team of two. They pushed each other to get to the best solutions.

They appear to be more colleagues and co-workers than friends. There are numerous scenes where Jamie is clearly telling Adam what to do in an exasperated manner and Jamie is the producer of the program meaning that Adam works for him. It seems to more of a pragmatic work relationship than it does an actual friendship.

Yes, they really did have their bust-ups - Adam admitted it himself and I believe Jamie did at some point too. But what overcomes an adverse working environment and the force of personality from co-workers? The love and passion of the job itself. Adam is probably one of the few people who would’ve persevered through it because he was able to keep his attention focused on the joy of doing what he loves to do. Building things, testing how things work, discovering new knowledge and blowing things up - and on top of all that, having different projects each week, sometimes having multiple projects happening at the same time. Dream job. It’s hard to figure out if Jamie had as much fun as Adam - being as expression-lacking as he sometimes is, we don’t know for sure. We do know that he’s the more practical of the two, and takes care of the business side of things. We also know that he can be an ass in general and is anal about his studio and its usage.

I think they only worked together on a contract basis before MythBusters and not side by side on a daily basis as co-producers and TV hosts. There was probably a honeymoon period. And when you turn out good work you can overlook a lot of things as many musicians have found out.

No they are not really friends. Everyone has that one person at thier job that they’ll say Hi to if the person says hi to them and who they HAVE to speak to to get work done, but wouldn’t hang out with outside of work. That’s Adam and Jamie

They seem to be friendly on the show, but rumors said that it was pretty much just an act, and they somewhat dislike each other, to the point that Adam starts his own show (which is quite similar in nature to MythBusters). But as long as they look good on the screen, I don’t really care how they are behind it.

They actually just got married this September. They have been in love for many years and they are so happy they can share their lives together, on and off the show. I hope they have a long happy life together.
They can’t hate each other. They are an INTJ and an ENTP. It can’t be possible D:
